title: Whales that wouldn't die
creator_credit: KPBS (Television station : San Diego, Calif.), Susan K Pollock and Frank Christopher
brief_description: Studies the characteristics, population density and habitats of the Grey Whale. Discusses the history of whaling, its particular effect on the Grey Whale, and the animal’s future prospects for survival.
creator_credit_for_label: KPBS (Television station : San Diego, Calif.), Susan K Pollock and Frank Christopher
